directions: In a blender or food processor, combine tomatoes, garlic, basil, oil and sugar and process until smooth.  Cover and refrigerate sauce.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Remove sauce from refrigerator and pour over spaghetti.  Toss to coat and serve topped with Parmesan cheese.
title: Cold Spaghetti
